name: Kite Guard
description:
"The most challenging and fun game of 2018! Protect your kites with your shield while it's rising up! Beware of the obstacles.The game is simple on the surface - tap to move your shield with one finger to keep protecting your kites from obstacles as you reach higher and higher! Shield control is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores!
Challenge your friends & share your high score! Try to be the number one in the rankings and prove that you are the best guardian."

How to play？
1.Move your shield with one finger to protect your kites.
2.Prevent obstacles from hitting kites.
3.Go through as many obstacles as you can and get high score.

Game Features:
1.A beautiful minimalist design and physics based game-play.
2.Different obstacles Shield and experience every time.
3.A lot of lovely skin waiting for you to unlock.
4.One finger control.
5.Endless gameplay.

Download Game today and face challenging levels and also if you love playing this game, share it with your friends and families.
